snippet: The advantages of the nation’s increasingly high-speed stock market are under the microscope after a number of recent trading malfunctions underscored the risks that have come with rapid changes.
abstract: Advantages of the nation's increasingly high-speed stock market are being scrutinized after several trading malfunctions underscored the risks that have come with rapid changes; studies and market participants suggest that benefits to investors have stalled or even started to reverse; prominent Wall Street trading firm Knight Capital lost $440 million in 45 minutes after installing faulty software designed to keep up with an evolving market.
lead_paragraph: The advantages of the nation’s increasingly high-speed stock market are under the microscope after a number of recent trading malfunctions underscored the risks that have come with rapid changes.

headline.seo: On Wall Street, the Rising Cost of High-Speed Trading
headline.main: On Wall Street, the Rising Cost of Faster Trades
headline.print_headline: On Wall Street, The Rising Cost Of Faster Trades
